name: Virtua[L] Fighter
description:
Created for Giant Rom 4. I took clips of Jeff and Vinny playing VR games and used them as sprites for a 2D fighting game. I would have loved to have included more characters, but obviously two was plenty of work for the scope of a game jam. It felt weird not having Jason in a Giant Bomb fighting game, but there isn't enough video of him waving his arms around frantically.

Controls:

Vinny: WASD, C, V

Jeff: IJKL, LMB, RMB

ESC to pause and view movelists

made entirely by me, John Scovic, from 1/27 - 2/5
